trans-unit.source: Secret:Provide a secret to secure the endpoint. 10 chars minimum!
Path segment:The segment of the path the Middleware should use to show the healthcheck result.
Allowed IPs:Restrict the endpoint to specific IPs. Comma separated lists are possible.
Enable debugging messages:Show debugging messages in the frontend or not.
Enable "buildinfo" extension information:Show the configured timestamp, buildnumber and Git version from the extension "buildinfo" (if installed)
Enable additional informations:Like the current IP address, current date, ...
Maximum allowed solr index queue item error count (if more errors than this, Healthcheck fails)
